caption.p: Association between immune subtypes and ICPs and ICD modulators. a, b Differential expression of ICP genes among the PAAD immune subtypes in ( a) ICGC and ( b) TCGA cohorts. c, d Differential expression of ICD modulator genes among the PAAD immune subtypes in ( c) ICGC and ( d) TCGA cohorts. * p < 0.01, ** p < 0.001, *** p < 0.0001, and **** p < 0.00001
